settings.name: Minimum duration in hours
settings.description: The minimum duration in hours that is considered a stop of interest (death or tag loss probable).

settings.name: Maximum diameter in meters
settings.description: The maximum diameters in meters that the tag's position may move and still be considered a stop.

settings.name: If only the last stop in a trajectory (most recent) should be used
settings.description: If more than one stop exist in a given trajectory, should only the last (most recent) stop be considered? Default is True (faster), but set to False to consider all stops within a trajectory.
